import React from 'react'; import { XCircle, Plus, CheckCircle, Mail } from 'lucide-react'; import { formatCurrency, formatDate } from '../AccountsReceivableUtils/formatters'; import { getCreditStatusColor } from '../AccountsReceivableUtils/styleHelpers'; const CustomerDetailModal = ({ customer, onClose, allSalesData }) => { const customerOrders = (allSalesData || []) .filter(order => { if (customer.id.startsWith('guest-')) { return order.orderId === customer.orderId; } return order.customerId === customer.id; }); return (

Customer Details - {customer.name}

{/* Customer Info Grid */}

{customer.id}

{customer.email}

{customer.phone}

{customer.address}

{customer.customerType.replace('_', ' ')}

{formatCurrency(customer.creditLimit)}

{customer.paymentTerms} days

{customer.creditStatus.replace('_', ' ')}
{/* Financial Summary */}
Current Balance
{formatCurrency(customer.totalOwed)}
Overdue Amount
{formatCurrency(customer.overdueAmount)}
Credit Available
{formatCurrency(customer.creditLimit - customer.totalOwed)}
Avg Payment Days
{customer.avgPaymentDays}
{/* Customer Orders */}

Customer Orders

{customerOrders.map((order) => ( ))}
Order Id Date Items Amount Payment Fulfillment
{order.orderId} {formatDate(order.createdAt)} {order.lineItems.map(item => item.productName).join(', ')} {formatCurrency(order.total)} {order.paid ? 'Paid' : 'Unpaid'} {order.fulfilled ? 'Fulfilled' : 'UnFulfillment'}
{customerOrders.length === 0 && (
No orders found for this customer
)}
{/* Action Buttons */}
); }; export default CustomerDetailModal;
